title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 399.5 - Parkway restrictions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 399.5 - Parkway restrictions

State Regulations

Parkways may be used for all vehicles except the
following: commercial vehicles, horses, snowmobiles and any vehicle having two
or three wheels any of which has an overall diameter of less than 15 inches
excluding the tire. Pedestrians are prohibited from walking on the pavement
and/or hitchhiking. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
399.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
